Class SimulatorConnectionAcceptor

java.lang.Object
SimulatorConnectionAcceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
public class SimulatorConnectionAcceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
Class handling connecting of simulators before the simulation.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulatorConnectionAcceptor

      public SimulatorConnectionAcceptor() throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor. Creates the server socket and binds it to SERVER_PORT
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if socket creation fails.

  • Method Details

    • getSimulators

      public SimulatorConnection[] getSimulators()
      Returns the currently connected simulators in an array
      Returns:
      SimulatorsConnection[] connected simulators.

    • getSimulatorsCount

      public int getSimulatorsCount()
      Returns number of currently connected simulators.
      Returns:
      int - currently connected simulators count

    • startAccepting

      public void startAccepting()
      Starts two threads. One is accepting new connections, the other pinging connected simulators and removing them if they were disconnected.

    • stopAccepting

      public void stopAccepting()
      Stops the accepting thread and pinging thread, pings connected simulators for check.

    • disconnectSimulators

      public void disconnectSimulators()
      Ends all connected simulator applications and clears the list of them.

      public void subscribe​(java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber subscriber)

      subscribe in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
